messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Head of Personnel's Desk
messages.body: Welcome station, bow to cargonia and nobody gets hurt

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Nanotransen has officially terminated all contracts due to ongoing legal obligations. Act as you will.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Hail cargonia, we the best nation on the station

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Please enjoy your new background soundtrack, We here at centcom have been working very hard on it since we no longer have jobs

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Special alert, A new Bioweapon has apparently been unleashed upon your station, Attempt to Corral those affected

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on [REDACTED], we believe that one of the station's animals/bots has developed [REDACTED] level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Any surviving crew members, We are sending you an evacuation option. You must ensure none of the infected board the shuttle, shortly after launch we will scan the shuttle, if any infected biosigns are found the shuttle will be destroyed

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

High levels of radiation detected near the station. Maintenance is best shielded from radiation.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

The radiation threat has passed. Please return to your workplaces.
